summary: Full frontend testing of Frontal Équestre Configurator completed. All 11 core tests passed (100%). The app displays correctly: empty browband image (frontal-vide.png), 19 crystals from sprite sheet, wave curve positioning, all 4 sizes working correctly (Poney:70, Cob:85, Full:99, XL:112 crystals), max 5 stone selection, clear all button, export modal with Shopify HTML code, copy button, mobile (375px) and tablet (768px) responsiveness.
passed_tests: 19 crystal types displayed in selection grid with real sprite images
Max 5 stones selection enforced (selection disabled after 5)
Crystals render on frontal preview following sinusoidal wave curve
Clear all (Tout effacer) button resets selection to 0/5
Export button disabled when no stones selected
Export button enabled when stones selected
Export modal opens with Shopify HTML code (2200+ chars)
'Copier le code' button present and functional
Mobile responsiveness (375x844) - 2-column grid, all features accessible
Frontal image (frontal-vide.png) displays without size labels - FIXED from iteration_6
critical_code_review_comments: App.js is well-structured with clear separation of concerns
Crystal positioning uses generateCrystalPositions() with sinusoidal wave curve - coordinates calibrated (startX=13%, endX=89%, centerY=34%, amplitude=30%)
Sprite sheet extraction logic correctly calculates background-position for each crystal
data-testid attributes properly implemented on all interactive elements
Responsive CSS breakpoints at 768px and 480px handle grid layout changes appropriately
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Previous issue (size labels on frontal image) has been resolved - app now uses frontal-vide.png (clean empty browband). Crystal wave positioning uses sinusoidal curve with parameters: CURVE_START_X=13%, CURVE_END_X=89%, CURVE_CENTER_Y=34%, CURVE_AMPLITUDE=30%. Sprite sheet crystals-grid.png is 1080x1080px with 5x4 grid layout.
